transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Ji Arora ji namaskar.

Executive: Namaste ji.

Executive: Sir Satyajit bol raha tha main IndiaMART se.

Customer: Achcha Satyajit.

Executive: Sir meri baat hui thi apne management se to sabka yahi kehna hai ki sir aap monthly se annual mein gaye the plus aap TrustSeal mein gaye the aapne Uj bhi kiya aisa bhi nahi hai sir ki aap naye customers hain jisko ki pehli baar IndiaMART ne koi service diya aur waha se kuch commitment hai sir aapko pata hai kya dekho shuru se na hum yahi baat pe argument kari ja rahe hain mujhe ye nahi cheez samajh aa rahi ki humne jab aapko clear kar diya ho ki humne service nahi leni aapki jo aap commitment karte ho sab fake hai hum kyun band kar rahe hain isi chakkar mein band kar rahe hain to fir aap baar baar ek hi cheez ko singam ki tarah kyun khich rahe ho sir jis profile pe dekho aapko milti tankha meri baat suno dhyan se aapko milti tankha aapne to karni argument main tankha nahi le raha hu mujhe yaha pe na kaam karna padta hai kaam karke hum earning karte hain customer ka time kharab karke earning nahi karte to aapki maine jo mail dali hui hai jo facebook pe social media pe dala hua hai us pe dhyan do waha pe baat karo yaha roz roz time mera kharab mat karo sir sir sir aap kaisi company ke existing member hain aapki profile pe 24 logo ne sir ek positive review rating dala hai 4.4 ka rating hai sir jahan se aapka dedh saal purana relation sir aap keh rahe hain mere se ki facebook pe baat karo twitter pe baat karo sir 24 me se 20 aapke fake hai main khud bol raha hu sir ye review maine to dala nahi hai na Imran VIP Katihar se agar kisi ne aapko review dala hai ki Ludhiana ke piller ko agar Katihar Katihar Bihar ke kisi customer ne review likha hai ya aapka Odisha se Rajasthan se agar kisi ne review likha hai sir to wo aapki baat buyer se hui hogi na hame to known bhi nahi hai sir ki kis buyer ne aapko review diya hai kab diya hai ye to mere portal fake hai apne na apna chat check karo agla call karta hai call cut karta hai date bhi dal deta hai wo aap khud hi dalwa rahe ho isi chakkar mein matlab fake hai customer aapke fake hai aapne to kuch na kuch to record rakhna hi hai na jo aap abhi baat kar rahe ho wo isiliye kar rahe ho

Executive: Sir in buyers se baat aapki hui hai sir meri baat nahi hui hai

Customer: Tabhi aapne yahi cheez boli hai ki aapko review to aa rahe hain aapko calling to aa rahi hai aap pick to kar rahe ho

Executive: Aur wahi cheez isiliye karte ho ki aapne dikhana hai ki hum kaam de rahe hain yaha pe koi kaam nahi mil raha

Executive: Sir ji kaam to kaam ko karna padega na sir kaam direct chal ke to koi aayega nahi na koi buyer hi to aapko milega na to fir buyer ko baat karke baat kar rahe ho aap hum yaha pe factory ke aise hi khol liye bina investment ke ki hame kaam hi nahi karna aata bilkul sir bilkul aapko kaam karna aata hai IndiaMART ka plan le liya hame kaam nahi karna aa raha yaar bade ajeeb se bande ho tum tumhe to nokri pe kisne rakh liya mujhe shak ho raha hai uske HR pe sir agar aapko aap ye cheez keh rahe hain ki mujhe aapke sare buyer fake hai rating aapne dalwaya hai to sir ye sari cheeze ek public limited company is tarike se kaam karti thi phir utni dalwai jo marzi boli jao mera same wahi hai answer samajh sakte ho theek hai nahi to faltu mein time mat kharab karo call cut kar do matlab refund hi aapka option hai sir refund hi solution hai samajh aa raha hai itne time se sir aapki jo service mere sath bachi hui hai ek minute sun lijiye aapki jo service bachi hai november beet gaya december january february march april may june saat mahine ki sir service bachi hai aapki to seven months ki service bachi hai to sir seven months ki service ka agar main refund bhi kar deta hu to 1820000 sir milega lekin ek bana banaya presence to chala jayega na sir kal aap dobara kabhi bhi IndiaMART kisi bhi online market pe jana chahenge to sir wo cheez to nahi mil payega seven months hai aapke liye mere liye nahi mujhe ek saal ka pura refund chahiye kyunki aapke jo executive hai jisne ye plan mujhe chipkaya hai puri ki puri mere paas history padi hui hai kya chat hui hai kya baat hui hai mujhe share kariye na aap mujhe wo history pehle na mujhe whatsapp check karo apna roz roz ek hi tamasha laga rakha hai usme kabhi kabhi isme unhone commitment me ye nahi kaha tha ki apna employee id batao kya mujhe bataya tha main agar aapko apni mail id se mail karunga to meri mail id sir agar koi commitment hogi to us commitment mein jab aap denge to usi ke bihaf pe hum company ke management se baat karenge na sir bina kisi aap uske mujhe aise hi batao maine employee id puchi humne aapko mail id de di sir humne mail id bilkul de di employee id ka aapko kya karna sir wo to hamari official purpose ke liye hamari mail id to aapke liye main kuch bhi mang sakta hu tum mere se gst number do registered ho ki nahi ho to main kyun baat karu yaar tum aise hi kahi bhi muh utha ke baat kar rahe ho mujhe kya pata tum main satyajit tiwari india mart satyajit tiwari@indiamartcom mail id tum satyajit ho ke nahi ho jhoot jit ho mujhe thodi na pata bola maine mail id to proof to maine bola na sir@indiamartcom hi mere proof hai na koi dusra offline aap chaho to aap india mart ki mail id nahi bana sakte na sir jab tum wo satisfy nahi kar sakte ho to main yaar kisi kaam ke nahi tum sirf apni baat rakh rahe ho tum aage wale ka nahi sunte ho to main tumhari kyun sunu sir agar refund ki main baat bhi karunga to pro rata basis pe refund hoga jitna din ka bacha hoga utna din ka hoga mat karo yaar tum wo bhi mat karo main complaint hi kar raha hu legal action le raha hu tum waha pe jo karna waha pe karna

Customer:
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a full refund for subscription.

- Customer alleges fake reviews and buyers.

- Customer claims commitments were not fulfilled.



Resolution:

- Executive explained pro-rata refund policy.

- Executive stated the benefits of continued presence.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Customer will take legal action.



Alert (If Any):

refund, complaint, legal action

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, fake reviews, legal action
